bestSelectAbout: Best Select Real Estate is a large-scale Arab company, specialized in marketing and real estate development in Turkey. It was established in 2014 in Istanbul, and it has a large team of specialists in the Turkish real estate market, and it has many agreements and dealings with most of the major construction companies in Istanbul
